LatestNews.Content: Steelers placed WR Plaxico Burress on injured reserve with a torn rotator cuff, ending his season.

LatestNews.Title: Steelers place WR Burress on year-ending I.R.

LatestNews.Content: Plaxico Burress suffered a torn rotator cuff in his shoulder during Thursday's camp practice, and is likely done for the year.

LatestNews.Title: Plax tears rotator cuff, likely done for year

LatestNews.Content: CBS Sports' Jason La Canfora reports the Steelers are planning to re-sign free agent Plaxico Burress "in the coming days."
